name: index(_:offsetBy:limitedBy:)
desc: Returns an index that is the specified distance from the given index, unless that distance is beyond a given limiting index.Required. Default implementation provided.

items.name: func index(Self.Index, offsetBy: Int, limitedBy: Self.Index) -> Self.Index?
items.desc: Returns an index that is the specified distance from the given index, unless that distance is beyond a given limiting index.

declaration: func index(_ i: Self.Index, offsetBy distance: Int, limitedBy limit: Self.Index) -> Self.Index?
